The Nintendo DS is a dual-screen handheld game console developed and manufactured by Nintendo. It was released in 2004 in Canada, USA and Japan. The console features a clamshell design, similar to the AdvanceSP Game Boy, with two LCD screens inside the bottom is a touch screen. On March 2, 2006, Nintendo launched the Nintendo ds , a redesign of the Nintendo DS in Japan. It was later released in North America, Europe and Australia in June 2006. The DS Lite is slimmer and lighter version of the Nintendo DS and has brighter screens.

Silk Scarves Look Great in spring, Summer, Fall & Wi

silk scarves are among a select group of fashion accessories that have become true classics over the years.
You can wear them on any type of dress... in the form of a belt, as a hair accessory or cover up a doubtful neckline. Today, it really isn't difficult to find a glamorous scarf. With the internet and the quality online stores, you'll be able to find beautiful silk scarves in virtually a matter of minutes.
Apart from being a fashion accessory, there are also other benefits of using a silk scarf. They provide warmth and protection to the neck during chilly and cold weathers. During warmer months, they just look great! And feel great! Of course, if you're in the middle of a dust storm in the Sahara desert they can also serve as a ready mouth and nose guard.
Seriously, choosing a right scarf from the huge variety available can be often confusing. You should always search for a scarf that is made of ravishing material, is well made and has the color or colors to enhance your complexion and hair color.
Scarf color and patterns also differ according to the season. Colors and shades worn during spring and summer are always lightweight and delicate. They can be either plain or patterned. Some of the colors that can be tried during spring and summer include dark gray, smoky gray, salmon, freesia, sky blue, aqua, navy, violet and turquoise.
Don't stay away from using patterns such as stripes, polka dots, blue or brown floral and ethnic designs. You can even opt for a patterned scarf with solids. Alternatively, a solid scarf with pattern is also a great option. If you are bold, you even mix patterns with other patterns only when the colors and sizes are alike.
During spring and summer seasons, you can opt from animal print silk scarves such as those with prints of Cheetah or Dalmatian, and silk scarves with tassels like black and gray zebra print and leopard print. Illustrated silk scarves such as those with black or brown horse illustration or illustrations of green flowers or circles are also popular during these seasons.
There are different ways in which scarves can be used. One can use them as a bandana, a head wrap or even as a belt. A head wrap is one style that goes well during any season and also protects the hair from getting damaged during inclement weather. One classical way of wearing a silk scarf is to wrap it around the head in the form of turban while leaving enough to tie a knot at the back side of the head. You can even allow the ends of the scarf to drape on the shoulders. However, you should remember to use a color that goes well with the color of your coat.
Bandanas really look trendy as a casual weekend style when they are paired with denim jacket or jeans. You should always use a color that matches with the shirt or blouse you are wearing under the denim jacket. In general, you can easily carry off a bold blue or red silk scarf in summer or spring without much ado.

Like R4i Gold, the CycloDS Evolution uses micro-SD cards for

Numerous manufacturers have created different versions of R4 cards, called R4 clones. Apart from these, few companies come with totally different SLOT-1 flash storage devices for Nintendo gaming consoles. Let us move ahead to compare an R4 card's clone and a new creation.

r4i gold

Firstly, we are talking about the r4i gold card. It is especially designed with a customized firmware, which loads over top of the Nintendo DS and allow the users running unsigned and custom software. The Gold card is said to be a clone of original r4 sdhc card. It supports micros-SD card up to 32GB. Its packaging box has smaller size than that of Supercard DSTWO and acekard 2i. The cart of Gold card has better build quality than that of Ackeard 2i, but worse than Supercard DSTWO.

The Wood firmware has better user interface than official version. In addition to r4i gold card, it helped SCDSS1, M3 and others to be popular across Nintendo users. Wood is quickly responsive like AKAIO. You can get numerous skins for this Wood firmware.

The r4i gold cards are supposed to flash the firmware but it is not updated to be compatible with DSi 1.4. Gold cards often load slowly despite of being a successor to r4 sdhc cards. However, it allows user maintaining games' library only on one cartridge. The inbuilt Moonshell, homebrew media player, plays back video and music files. The R4IDS launched latest www.3 updates for both first edition and V2 Gold cards.

CycloDS Evolution

Now, let us have a look on CycloDS Evolution cards. It is a multi-functional micro-SD adapter for Nintendo DS Lite and DS gaming consoles. It allows user playing games, listening MP3 music, viewing images, reading e-books and enjoying various homebrew applications.

CycloDS Evolution is the most advanced Media Enhancer for Nintendo DS and DS Lite. It boasts quality components, European design and better functionality. The additional highlights are SlowMotion mode, LCD brightness adjustment while playing game, in-game reset and RealTime Save.

cyclods cheat code engine supports Action Replay codes directly. Surprisingly, this Evolution card comes with more than 300 games' cheat codes. You can save game progress at any point and resume again from the same point using RealTime Save feature. It allows you mastering the game without facing much difficulty. In fact, RealTime Save is quite similar to the 'saved states' found on few emulators.

Inbuilt operating system of CycloDS Evolution can work with homebrew software without installing any patch. In addition, you will get faster loading than any other R4DS card. You just have to simply tap and play any game without troubles or significant delays. In addition, these Evolution cards save you from manually applying DLDI patches. They automatically install the required DLDI updates.

Like r4i gold, the CycloDS Evolution uses micro-SD cards for storage. The Evolution cards come with micro-SD USB Reader to transfer games, files, and homebrew software. Its user interface is exclusively designed to be user friendly and works quite well with the stylus. What's more? The user interface is multi-lingual and supports Portuguese, Latin American Spanish, Spanish, Korean, Italian, German, French, and English.

The above comparison helps you while selecting between the Gold card and CycloDS Evolution cards. Both are SLOT-1 based Flash card solutions but have different features.
